chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
yes
awesome! i'm at the starting point, there's a twig here leading to an island with a tiger
¿hacia dónde ahora?
I'm at the starting point as well, I see the twig and tiger as well
cool, so i am taking the twig to reach the tiger now, right?
yes and omce you are near the tiger you would pass a rock and see another twig that youu can use to reach the parrot
awesome, headed to the parrot now
Entendido, ¿qué sigue?
once you do that, ypu will go round and pass an elephant and go right, you will see two grey rocks and use them to cross over where there is a frog
jolly good! i'm with the frog now
which way should i scamper off next?
you will see the a gator and use it to cross, but jump before it bites you and reach a big black rock
haha alright, skipped the croc, i see the big black rock
¿Cuál es el siguiente paso, amigo?
use that to get to two grey rocks and pass the griffare
got it, just passed the giraffe
now what buddy?
hey, estas listo?
si

perfecto, entonces comenzaremos. ahora mismo estás junto a ese adorable perro blanco, ¿cierto? ve unos pasos a la izquierda, debajo de un banco de madera. cruza ese camino que está enfrente, hacia el puesto de flores
but no, don't go to the stall. make a full left turn and cross the road again. then continue towards the white dog again. that's to warm up
okay
now, head past ol' white fur, towards the south
Verás a un gemelo, otro perro blanco sentado junto a una estera de picnic roja y blanca. sigue bajando
I'm doing that
awesome! step on that picnic mat but aim for that tempting bowl of berries, okay? afterwards, keep heading west
okay what now
spot the branch crossing the river north? go for it! cross it like a brave explorer
crossed the branch? what now friend
¡Cinco altos! Ahora, ¿ves ese arbusto verde de allí? ¡no te topes con eso! en su lugar, rodéelo por la derecha, hasta el puesto de floristería.
sounds good
genial! ahora gira a la izquierda, pasa debajo del puesto de flores hacia ese gran puente
Do you see those two on bicycles? continues its route to the west
hey there, estas listo?
Yes!
cool! i'm at the tent up north
fire with a dog on its left, red mushroom to the right, a blue car and blue telescope further down. so, where to amigo?
go down and pass the dog, to your right. Avoid the fire but going around it
got it, passed the dog and dodged the fire
¿Qué sigue, amigo?
from there, go down and make a left turn , avoid the green bush and the blue car, head down to a telescope.
alright, done! i'm standing by the telescope
what's next, my friend?
use the rocks to your left and walk until you see the cabin
found the rocks and walked up to the wooden house
*finished* thanks for directing me, amigo!
hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
Yes, I am by the palm trees. where to
awesome, let's kick this off! first, walk southwest under the nearest palm tree
then take a right when you pass the next one. make a sharp left before you reach the third tree and continue heading down south
Okay, do I avoid the dog? where to now?
yeah, let's not disturb the pup
Gire un poco hacia la izquierda para mantenerse alejado de él, luego gire ligeramente a la derecha, todavía en dirección sur.
avoided the pup? where now. I am on the sand close to the dog
nice, keep going straight
you'll notice a big rock on your left and a smaller one on your right. cross between them towards the water
Okay, I did that!
awesome, step into the ocean now. but watch out for the crab! it's a big red one
Gire a la derecha desde el cangrejo y siga la gran roca hacia el oeste. sigue en el agua
Avoided the crab> Where do I go now friend!
keep going until you run into a medium-sized rock
I did that
perfect! now say hi to the shark in the water and make a sharp right turn
I made the righ and sai hello to the shark. He says hi back. I'm on the rock next to him
haha, sharks are such social creatures! okay, now go back to the land between the medium rock and a colorful ball
enderezate hacia el norte
I am right next to both now!
great job! now, take a slight left and head towards the northwest
you'll see a red tent and a big speaker, just walk right between them
I did that, should I play some music
jaja, ¡dejemos la fiesta para más tarde! Por ahora, simplemente rodea la tienda y dirígete hacia el sur.
did that
amazing, keep it moving south until you reach the shore
but don't let your feet get wet yet! turn right towards the red kayak
At the kayak now!
Genial, ahora haz un giro completo de 90 grados a la derecha y sigue el kayak hacia el norte.

general_survey.answer: This makes me want to brush up on my Spanish reading more than anything.
